about_the_game:
Alchemical INC. takes a tactical card battler and wraps the experience in a lush, first person adventure. You play as a kid living in the shadow of the Alchemical INC. factory. Every day, you must go down to the market to find food for your family. Cards are the currency in New Folk City and in this town, they believe in trading your cards to get what you need.

Strategic Card Battles

  • Turn based gameplay
  • No time limit
  • Command a powerful Alchemist with unique skills
  • Configure your kit with Elementals, Action, and Reaction Cards
  • Plan the order of your cards
  • Auto battle turns once you are ready

Elemental Fusions

  • Specific elementals combine into more powerful cards
  • Discover 100+ hidden recipes
  • Be rewarded for risky experimentations

Dynamic Deck Building

  • 300+ cards in the game
  • Take cards from your defeated opponents
  • Collect Deck Boxes to craft unique starter decks
  • Trade cards with vendors

Experience New Folk City

Home to the Alchemical INC. factory, the surrounding neighborhood is flooded with Alchemy cards, corruption, pollution, and debauchery.

  • Procedurally generated levels
  • Scaling difficulty
  • Unlock new areas in the city
